plugin.author: Graffiti team (jf), Christian Klukas
plugin.description: A very simple serializer for "Graphviz" - Graph Drawing Programs from AT&T Research and Lucent Bell Labs. It can only write a small subset of the graph information.

plugindesc.name: DOT reader,writer,layout
plugindesc.available: This plugin is part of the graffiti distribution and has been enhanced with read-support by CK.
